title: Vice President Mike Pence Announces the Following Individuals to Key Posts – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
May 27, 2020
Today, Vice President Mike Pence announced the following individuals to key positions in the Office of the Vice President:Katie Miller, to serve as Communications DirectorDevin O’Malley, to serve as Press SecretarySamantha Schwab, to serve as Deputy Press SecretaryHannah MacInnis, to serve as Digital DirectorCaroline Frattaroli, to serve as Research DirectorLaura Schlapp, to serve as Director of Regional MediaElise Zappia, to serve as Press Assistant
